title: BRIEF-Bharti Airtel picks Ericsson for 5G-Ready Cloud Packet Core
text:
BRIEF-Bharti Airtel picks Ericsson for 5G-Ready Cloud Packet Core

Stock Markets 6 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 12:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bharti Airtel picks Ericsson for 5G-Ready Cloud Packet Core Oct 16 (Reuters) - Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson (BS: ) : * BHARTI AIRTEL SELECTS ERICSSON'S 5G-READY CLOUD PACKET CORE (NS: ) TO BOOST NETWORK PERFORMANCE * THE DEPLOYMENT WILL CONSIST OF SOLUTIONS LIKE ERICSSON VIRTUAL EVOLVED PACKET GATEWAY (VEPG) THAT FOLLOW ETSI STANDARDS * THE DEPLOYMENT WILL ENHANCE CAPACITY IN AIRTEL'S NETWORK AND ENABLE THE NETWORK TO ADDRESS THE RAPIDLY GROWING DEMAND FOR HIGH-SPEED DATA SERVICES.
